verses.verse: And it came to pass a long<WH7227> time<WH3117> after<WH310> that the LORD<WH3068> had given rest<WH5117> unto Israel<WH3478> from all their enemies<WH341> round about<WH5439>, that Joshua<WH3091> waxed old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age<WH3117>.

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all Israel<WH3478>, and for their elders<WH2205>, and for their heads<WH7218>, and for their judges<WH8199>, and for their officers<WH7860>, and said<WH559> unto them, I am old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age<WH3117>:

And ye have seen<WH7200> all that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath done<WH6213> unto all these nations<WH1471> because<WH6440> of you; for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> is he that hath fought<WH3898> for you.

Behold<WH7200>, I have divided<WH5307> unto you by lot these nations<WH1471> that remain<WH7604>, to be an inheritance<WH5159> for your tribes<WH7626>, from Jordan<WH3383>, with all the nations<WH1471> that I have cut off<WH3772>, even unto the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> westward<WH3996><WH8121>.

And the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he shall expel<WH1920> them from before<WH6440> you, and drive<WH3423> them from out of your sight<WH6440>; and ye shall possess<WH3423> their land<WH776>, as the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath promised<WH1696> unto you.

Be ye therefore very<WH3966> courageous<WH2388> to keep<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> all that is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872>, that ye turn<WH5493> not aside therefrom to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>;

That ye come<WH935> not among these nations<WH1471>, these that remain<WH7604> among you; neither make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of their gods<WH430>, nor cause to swear<WH7650> by them, neither serve<WH5647> them, nor bow<WH7812> yourselves unto them:
But cleave<WH1692> unto the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>, as ye have done<WH6213> unto this day<WH3117>.

For the LORD<WH3068> hath driven out<WH3423> from before<WH6440> you great<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and strong<WH6099>: but as for you, no man<WH376> hath been able to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you unto this day<WH3117>.
One<WH259> man<WH376> of you shall chase<WH7291> a thousand<WH505>: for the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he it is that fighteth<WH3898> for you, as he hath promised<WH1696> you.
Take good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> therefore unto yourselves<WH5315>, that ye love<WH157> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

Else if ye do in any wise<WH7725> go back<WH7725>, and cleave<WH1692> unto the remnant<WH3499> of these nations<WH1471>, even these that remain<WH7604> among you, and shall make marriages<WH2859> with them, and go in<WH935> unto them, and they to you:

Know<WH3045> for a certainty<WH3045> that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> will no more<WH3254> drive out<WH3423> any of these nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> you; but they shall be snares<WH6341> and traps<WH4170> unto you, and scourges<WH7850> in your sides<WH6654>, and thorns<WH6796> in your eyes<WH5869>, until ye perish<WH6> from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> you.

And, behold, this day<WH3117> I am going<WH1980> the way<WH1870> of all the earth<WH776>: and ye know<WH3045> in all your hearts<WH3824> and in all your souls<WH5315>, that not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> hath failed<WH5307> of all the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> spake<WH1696> concerning you; all are come to pass<WH935> unto you, and not one<WH259> thing<WH1697> hath failed<WH5307> thereof.

Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good<WH2896> things<WH1697> are come<WH935> upon you, which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> promised<WH1696> you; so shall the LORD<WH3068> bring<WH935> upon you all evil<WH7451> things<WH1697>, until he have destroyed<WH8045> you from off this good<WH2896> land<WH127> which the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> you.

When ye have transgressed<WH5674> the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which he commanded<WH6680> you, and have gone<WH1980> and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods<WH430>, and bowed<WH7812> yourselves to them; then shall the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and ye shall perish<WH6> quickly<WH4120> from off the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which he hath given<WH5414> unto you.
